column4: I got a new ISP today I can connect in windows but not in ubuntu.  What do i have to change? I went from dsl to broadband.
Do you have an ethernet router or a USB modem?
Go into System>Administration>Networking and look for your Ethernet device. Set it to DHCP mode and activate it, and make sure it is the default gateway
i will try that tomorrow when i get back from work thanks.
